SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!executes a given sql script file :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:IF &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -usr "&UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -pwd "&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -jdbc_conn "&UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -jar "&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -class "&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, " -t &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRY# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, " -n &UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRY#") :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, " -tns &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA#") :ENDIF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&JDBC_TOOL_JAR#" database SQLFeature -script "&UC4RB_SQL_FILENAME#" ? &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# -sep "&UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
